timeline.details: Andaman district was initially formed encompassing all of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands.
sections_of_text_for_this_info: Andaman district was a district in the Indian Union Territory (UT) of Andaman and Nicobar Islands.
The district's administrative territory encompasses all of the Andaman Islands, which are located in the Indian Ocean (Bay of Bengal, bordering with the Andaman Sea).
The district was created on August 1, 1974, when it was separated from Andaman district.

timeline.details: The Nicobar Islands were separated from the Andaman district to form the Nicobar district.

territory_lost.text_details: The district was created on August 1, 1974, when it was separated from Andaman district.

sections_of_text_for_this_info: The district was created on August 1, 1974, when it was separated from Andaman district.

timeline.details: The Andaman district was dissolved and its remaining territory (Andaman Islands) divided into North and Middle Andaman district and South Andaman district.

territory_lost.text_details: The district comprised two sub-divisions, North & Middle Andaman (Mayabunder), and South & Little Andaman (Port Blair), which were turned into North and Middle Andaman district
The district comprised two sub-divisions, North & Middle Andaman (Mayabunder), and South & Little Andaman (Port Blair), which were turned into ... and South Andaman district

sections_of_text_for_this_info: The district comprised two sub-divisions, North & Middle Andaman (Mayabunder), and South & Little Andaman (Port Blair), which were turned into North and Middle Andaman district and South Andaman district on August 18, 2006.

timeline.details: Nicobar district was created by separating it from Andaman district.
sections_of_text_for_this_info: The district was created on August 1, 1974, when it was separated from Andaman district.

timeline.details: South Andaman district was created by bifurcating the erstwhile Andaman district.

territory_gained.text_details: This district was created on August 18, 2006, by bifurcating the erstwhile Andaman district.

sections_of_text_for_this_info: This district was created on August 18, 2006, by bifurcating the erstwhile Andaman district.

timeline.details: North and Middle Andaman district was created by bifurcating the erstwhile Andaman district.

territory_gained.text_details: This district was created on August 18, 2006, by bifurcating the erstwhile Andaman district,[2] which included all three tehsils of Mayabunder sub-division of this erstwhile district.
